findings.title: Distributor fails to distribute appropriate rewards.
findings.description: The payOrLockupPendingSolar function does not correctly distribute rewards, leading to potential loss of funds.

findings.title: SolarDistributorV2#poolRewarders() function does not return a normal value
findings.description: Rewarders declared as a return variable of SolarDistributorV2#poolRewarders() function have a default value until the reallocation of the value. Because the default value of the array is empty, rewarders are also empty until reallocated.

findings.title: Invalid event names set in SolarDistributorV2#setTreasuryPercent(), SolarDistributorV2#setInvestorPercent() functions.
findings.description: Events corresponding to changes in the function are not properly set, making it difficult to determine whether the corresponding value has been changed in the application and whether the corresponding function has been called.

findings.title: The require message in SolarDistributorV2#set() function is set incorrectly.
findings.description: A message starting with 'add:' is set in the require message inside solarDistributorV2#set() function. This is unlikely to be intended.
